snippet: Michelle A. Rhee, the former schools chancellor in Washington, D.C., is now pushing education reform through her organization Students First -- and continuing to annoy the teachers' unions along the way. What follows is a condensed and edited...
abstract: Michelle A. Rhee, the former schools chancellor in Washington, D.C., is now pushing education reform through her organization Students First -- and continuing to annoy the teachers' unions along the way. What follows is a condensed and edited transcript of her conversation with Michael D. Shear.
